sentences.english: Non-metallic mineral resources are very rich in Inner Mongolia, but development and utilization are very poor.
sentences.chinese: 我区非金属矿产资源丰富，但开发利用程度很低。

sentences.english: He says little of the income from oil, the mining and extractive sectors trickle down to the poor.
sentences.chinese: 他说，石油和矿产资源出口带来的收入很少惠及穷人。

sentences.english: The undulating hills are rich in mineral resources.
sentences.chinese: 峰峦起伏的群山中蕴藏着丰富的矿产资源。

sentences.english: GIS-based Digital Mine (DM) is the key on the mineral resource prediction.
sentences.chinese: 而基于GIS的数字矿区是进行矿产资源预测的关键。

sentences.english: Mineral resources in the Paleo-Asia domain are extremely abundant.
sentences.chinese: 古亚洲成矿域矿产资源十分丰富。

sentences.english: The mineral resource utilization system which is a non-linear system is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了矿产资源利用这一非线性系统。
瓦房店矿产资源十分丰富。

sentences.english: When completed, Quzhou-Changshan Railway will greatly facilitate the mineral resources development in Changshan County.
sentences.chinese: 建设衢常铁路将大大促进常山县矿产资源的开发。

sentences.english: In addition, the abundant aquatic resources and mineral resources supported some fishing or mining settlements.
sentences.chinese: 丰富的水产资源和矿产资源，使专业性聚落应运而生。

sentences.english: The development of different period mineral reconnoitering and exploitation of our country is reviewed…
sentences.chinese: 对我国不同时期的矿产资源开发利用工作进行了回顾。

sentences.english: The characteristics of carboniferous strata and milleral resources in guangxi were briefly in troducted.
sentences.chinese: 概要介绍广西石炭纪地层特征及矿产资源。

sentences.english: Qinzhou area is rich in mineral resources, more variety, large storage.
sentences.chinese: 秦州区具有丰富的矿产资源，品种多，贮量大。

sentences.english: Mineral resources are widely distributed in Zibo city with a long exploration history.
sentences.chinese: 淄博市矿产资源分布广泛，开发历史悠久。

sentences.english: Tavan Tolgoi was supposed to set the standard for how the country would handle its mineral resources.
sentences.chinese: 塔班陶勒盖本应为蒙古如何处理矿产资源树立标准。

sentences.english: The mineral resources original value is the object to levy royalty.
sentences.chinese: 矿产资源的原有价值是权利金征收的对象。

sentences.english: The non-renewable resources on the Earth are the resources base for sustainable develpment.
sentences.chinese: 地球上不可再生的矿产资源是可持续发展的资源基础。

definition: remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
